text:
<@U0177RKAS1H> Hi There - I found this thread useful, but have a follow on question if that is ok?

Our SSO is configured via onelogin and we use the onelogin URL to sign in on our system. In my custom modules, I'm trying to use the request_contact.is_logged_in property and it doesnt' seem to be set. Is that property reserved for use only if you login using the HubSpot login URLS? Trying to sort out if I need a different method to detect a valid, signed-in user.
Thanks in advance for any help!
